morningBrief.headline: Storm Cycle Building
morningBrief.body: 152 trails open, 76 groomed. Clear, temperatures TBD. 6 runs freshly groomed, mostly in Skyline, Whiffletree, and more. Winter has more to say. 6" forecasted means conditions improving soon.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: 142 trails open, 82 groomed. Mostly Clear, temperatures TBD. Nearly full mountain access with 142 of 144 trails spinning. The weather models are locked in: 9" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Loaded
morningBrief.body: 85 trails open, 68 groomed. Mostly Clear, temperatures TBD. Nearly full mountain access with 85 of 85 trails spinning. Winter has more to say. 10" forecasted means conditions improving soon.

morningBrief.headline: Winter's Coming Back
morningBrief.body: 177 of 222 trails are open with 99 groomed. Mostly Cloudy with a temperatures TBD. Storm cycle alert! 18" on the way. Conditions are about to level up.

morningBrief.headline: Is It the Weekend Yet?
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 9.4" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Cold day ahead: 15.8° high. Dress warmly.

morningBrief.headline: Mother Nature Can't Decide
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 11.8" over the last week. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. The elevation will make all the difference today. Rain down low, snow up high.

morningBrief.headline: Arctic Air in Place
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 9.8" over the last week. Bundle up! 8.6° is no joke. The snow will be fast though.
